alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:01AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Harney County through 1145 AM PDT... At 1042 AM PDT, a pilot reported a small landspout to the surface 15 miles west of Burns, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Burns, Hines and Sand Hill around 1140 AM PDT. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. When safe to do so, please relay storm reports to the National Weather Service in Boise via local law enforcement, or National Weather Service Boise Facebook and Twitter accounts.
